predicate.note: Frames file for 'cash' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: turn a check into real money

example.name: greedy little bugger
example.text: John waited 15 whole seconds before *trace* cashing the check he got from his grandmother for his birthday.
example.arg: the check he got from his grandmother for his birthday.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Why is he cashing in now?

example.name: transitive
example.text: Many skittish mutual fund investors picked up the phone yesterday, but decided not *trace* to cash in their chips after all.

example.name: punk over prep
example.text: Many clothiers, especially Ralph Lauren, have cashed in on the recent popularity of updated Ivy League and English styles.
example.arg: the recent popularity of updated Ivy League and English styles
